From: "Testifier: Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@...>

OOC:  Hmm, now, if we had Abominus, Surgital, AND Menasor at Maximal
City............*hint hint!!!!!*

::Bodicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Jume/Whee/Quatro/Hakibuscon::

The Bodicons arrived at the Maximal Base(and Shokaract shouldn't be too far
behind, Roland, get him over here!).

"Booyah!" Decapitron shouted.

"Attack!" Triggerhappy ordered.

Decapitron nodded, then he and his troops went around spreading out around
the front, to help Blindfear, Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee.  Decapitron shot a
plasma saw blade at Maximal City.  Headshot, from a distance, sprayed a few
sniper shots at Maximal City.  Gutclaw, being a close-combat warrior, had
some trouble, not too much though.  He kept running and dodging shots from
the defense.  He went over by Skullgrin and fired some pistol shots from a
pistol,(duh) he found.  Legtrap shot a special net-shield thingies and they
made slightly protective barriers around all the Decepticons attacking.
Then, Legtrap fired a missile at Maximal City.  Explobody, who was now
loving it already, fired some grenades at Maximal City, after all, he wasn't
called Explobody for nothing, he was demolitions all the way!
~~~~~~~~~
Skullgrin transformed into tank mode and fired some blasts at Maximal City.
~~~~~~~~
Triggerhappy continued to hide and wait for more reinforcements.
~~~~~~~~~
Jume and Whee shot some more blasts at Maximal City.
~~~~~~~~~
Quatro heard the attackers and the announcement, and got his phase-disruptor
rifle ready to kick some Decepticlown butt.  He headed for the entrance...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hakibuscon, who happened to be roaming around Africa, saw the attack.

"I'll help them......I must kill Quatro, as well," he said, secretly from
nowhere firing a shot from a fusion cannon at Maximal City.
